sub_title: MBA - General Sub-Treasurer of the Province and Instructor of Basic Accounting at UNTdF
summary:
Current independent accountant in Argentina moving to Europe, trained in administrative-accounting areas, specialized in costs, with more than 7 years of experience in large manufacturing companies of electronic devices, both multinationals and leaders retailers in my country. Outstanding skill in productive processes and in analysis of industrial and logistic costs, management control, inventory control, projection of results, review and improvement of internal processes. Vast experience in monthly accounting closings, reconciliations, imputation control, module closures, preparation of Financial Statements, conversion and adaptation to international standards (USGAAP). Also, I've worked analyzing tariffs for public services, and my last position in the public sector was serving as General Sub-Treasurer of the Province of Tierra del Fuego, dealing mainly with the financial strategy of the administration of public revenue collection and the most efficient allocation in compliance with the commitments assumed by the government.

- Fast learner
- Great ability for interpersonal relationships and rapid integration into work teams.
- Proactivity, agility and good predisposition to results-oriented challenges.
- Very good analytical, control and projection capacity.
- Easy adaptation to change.

profile_positions.location: Belgrano N° 855, Río Grande, Tierra del Fuego, Argentina.
profile_positions.description: Outsourcing, professional services in general, accountancy, taxes, payrolls, certifications of income and woods, internal and external audit, business analysis and financial advisor, in Argentina.

profile_positions.description: Oversee the cash flow of Government revenue, tax fundraising,  public spending, investments and deficit funding. Ensuring the appropriate performance of the financial systems,  controls and reconciliation of official bank accounts.
profile_positions.title: General Sub-Treasurer of the Province

profile_positions.location: Ushuaia, Tierra del Fuego, Antártida e Islas del Atlántico Sur, Argentina
profile_positions.company: Gobierno de la Provincia de Tierra del Fuego
profile_positions.title: Provincial Director of Financial Management

profile_positions.description: Accounting and administrative consultory services regarding Public Services and Transport. Analysis and redetermination of public rates, the incidence of State compensation and subsidies in the private sector.
profile_positions.title: External Consultant

profile_positions.description: I was head of the account payable team with four people collaborating with me in the process of reviewing and verifying invoices and checking requests, organizing and prioritizing their activities, setting invoices up for payment, entering and uploading invoices into the system, doing invoice allocation controls (purchase traceability), controlling account inputs, budgeting and analysis of cost deviations. Also producing monthly reports to my manager, assisting with month-end closing and providing supporting documentation for audits.
profile_positions.title: Account Payables Leader and Manufacturing Indirect Cost

profile_positions.description: Monitoring and control of Import and Export operations, upload and control of expenses related to this area. Since the province of Tierra del Fuego has a special tax regime in Argentina I have done many administrative paper work to present to the government regarding the industry and the products that the company I was working for by that time had, as presentations of new projects, production rates, controls of products accreditations, disaffections and disposals of scrap, all of this to the CAAE, AFIP-DGA, among others.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Comex Analyst and Governmental relations

profile_positions.description:
As Sr. Cost Analyst (2010-2011): Mainly management control and budget. Regarding the tasks that I have done I can highlight the analysis and determination of costs, the justification of deviations and variations established by contract and compared to standard cost. I also had to control every accounting input in the Income Statement monthly and implemented the harmonization of the traditional chart of accounts to costs. Moreover, I developed and kept updated KPIs and graphical interpretation of the variations.

As Sr. Accountancy Analyst (2007-2010): This was my first job and I have learnt everything from scratch. I started reconciling bank accounts, intercompany accounts, inventories, accounts receivable, allocations, doing taxes, analyzing costs and controlling the conversion cost, analyzing and justification of deviations in accounts, checking expenses, preparation of Financial Statements and convert them according USGAAP
profile_positions.title: Sr. Cost Analyst - Sr. Accountancy Analyst

volunteer_experiences.description:
#SoyMiJefe was an awareness workshop for #artisans, #entrepreneurs and #smalllocalproducers whose objective was to communicate and promote the regularization of these workers, taking as a challenge the improvement of the quality of independent employment.

Type of activities: Individual and group interviews, analysis and feedback to the entrepreneurs with the best options for each of them.

Target audience
Local entrepreneurs with a developed business model (without sales) or with incipient sales.

Duration
8 encounter of 2 hours each in different places in town.

Number of attendees
12 entrepreneurs

------------------------------------

#SoyMiJefe taller de sensibilización para #artesanos, #emprendedores y #productores cuyo objetivo es comunicar y propiciar la regularización de estos trabajadores, tomando como desafío la mejora de la calidad del empleo independiente.

Tipo de actividades: Entrevistas individuales y grupales, análisis y devoluciones a los emprendedores con la mejor opción para cada uno.

Publico objetivo
Emprendedores locales con un modelo de negocio en desarrollado (sin ventas) o ya implementado pero con un promedio de ventas bajo.

Duración
8 encuentros de 2 horas cada uno en diferentes puntos de la ciudad.

Número de participantes
12 emprendedores

The training course provides tools to entrepreneurs to identify the necessary aspects at the time of perform the calculation of the costs of a product or service.
The pricing strategy will be essential to ensure the sustainability of the business. To determine the sale price of a product / service will take into account different variables, in addition to contemplating the
expected profitability for business growth.

Developed topics:
- Cost, price and value of the product / service.
- Types of costs. Determination and calculation.
- Elasticity of demand. Breakeven.
- Methods of pricing: based on cost, demand or competition.
- Price strategies: penetration, average price, high price, etc.

Type of activities
Workshop-Theoretical-practical

Target audience
Local entrepreneurs with a developed business model (without sales) or with incipient sales.

Duration
3 courses with 13 encounter of 2 hours, each.

Number of attendees
Between 10 and 15 people
